Text.Language: Hananso n~so: nem hany~ba n~y~ba: n~ar,/aggeloc: nem aggeloc eyouab.
Thousands of thousands, and myriads of myriads, of archangels, and holy angels.

Euo~hi e~ratou: m~pem~yo m~piy~ronoc: n~te pipantokratwr: euws e~bol eujw m~moc.
They stand before, the throne, of the Pantocrator, proclaiming and saying.

Je ,~ouab ,~ouab: ,~ouab qen oumeym/i: piw~ou nem pitaio~: erp~repi n~}t~riac.
Holy Holy, Holy in truth, the glory and the honor, befit the Trinity.

Hiten nip~recbia: n~te p~,oroc t/rf n~te niaggeloc: Po#c# a~rih~mot nan: m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the intercessions, of the whole choir of the angels, O Lord grant us, the forgiveness of our sins.

Through the prayers, of my lords and fathers the apostles, O Lord grant us, the forgiveness of our sins.

Han,~lom n~atlwm: aft/itou n~je Po#c#: hijen p~,oroc t/rf: n~te nimarturoc.

Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Demiana:

Text.Language: Ounis] a~l/ywc: pe piw~ou nem pitaio: etacjwlh m~mwou e~bol: n~je ]cab/ m~paryenoc.
Truly great is the / glory and honor / by which was adorned / the wise virgin.

}cwtp n~kuria: ]mai eynanec: ]marturoc n~a~gnia: ]a~gia m~m/i Dumian/.
The chosen lady, / the respectable beloved, / the chaste martyr, St. Demiana.

<ere ]a~gnia: ,ere y/eynanec: ,ere ]a~gia~: ]cwtp n~Dumian/.

<ere ]marturoc: ,ere ]kayaroc: ,ere ]pana~gia: ]cwtp m~paryenoc.

<ere ]paryenoc: ,ere ]a~tywleb: eymeh n~e~ulogia: ]selet m~pihi/b.
Hail to the martyr, / hail to the unblemished, / who is full of blessing, / the Bride of the lamb.

<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: icjen tecmeta~lou: ,ere y/etc~marwout: qen niparyenoc t/rou.

Comment.Language: For the Patriarchs and the Prophets

Text.Language: <ere ?liac: picovron m~p~rov/t/c: nem Eliceoc: pefcwtp m~may/t/c.
Hail to Elijah, the prophet of temperance, and Elisha, his elect disciple.
Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù„Ø§Ù… Ù„Ø¥ÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ§ Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø¨Ù‰ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØªØ¹Ù?Ù? ÙˆØ§Ù„ÙŠØ´Ø¹ ØªÙ„Ù…ÙŠØ°Ù‡ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø®ØªØ§Ø±.
Pinis] n~refhiwis: qen ],wra n~te </mi: Markoc pia~poctoloc: pecsorp n~neferhemi.
The great Evangelist, of the land of Egypt, Mark the Apostle, the first prelate.
Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¨Ø´Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø¸ÙŠÙ… Ù?Ù‰ ÙƒÙˆØ±Ø© Ù…ØµØ± Ù…Ø±Ù‚Ø³ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø³ÙˆÙ„ Ù…Ø¯Ø¨Ø±Ù‡Ø§ Ø§Ù„Ø£ÙˆÙ„.
Nyo pe y~mau m~V]: Maria ]paryenoc: twbh m~mof e~jwn: eyrefnai qa pengenoc.

Pinis] m~patriar,/c: peniwt abba Ceu/roc: v/e~ta nefc~bwoui~ e#y#u#: e~rouwini m~pennouc.
The great patriarch, our father Abba Severus, whose holy teachings, enlightened our minds.

Peniwt n~o~mologit/c: abba Diockoroc: afmisi e~jen pinah]: oube niheretikoc.
Our father the confessor, Abba Dioscorus, defended the faith, against the heretics.

Nem nenio] t/rou: e~tauranaf m~Po#c#: e~re pouc~mou e#y#u#: swpi nan n~ourefrwic.
